channel.title: Colossus 742! 24/7! BRAND new! Looking for a new players! Live as of today! <3
channel.description:
Hello! Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now. Before I make a long speech 75% of you won't read, I'm just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom!
EDIT: COLOSSUS IS 100% RUNNING! VPS 24 HOUR HOSTED! WEB SITE AND FORUMS UP AND RUNNING! TAKING ALL MEMBERS OUT OF BETA PHASE!
Go to our website! <3 [URL=http://"http://colossusrsps.com/"]http://colossusrsps.com/[/URL]
Download our client
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?oagf47asjpam6p5]Colossus.rar[/url]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EFvd[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EFUy[/img] FULLY WORKING BANK FUNCTIONS!
[img]http://puu.sh/3EG73.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EIkm.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EIaI.png[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGbh.jpg[/img] Fully functional Completionist Cape!
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGvC.jpg[/img] New Models, Every item usable!
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmCq.jpg[/img] A sorta orginal home! :)
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmGe.jpg[/img] A MOTHER-FU!@##@! BABY JAD!
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmI6.jpg[/img] Working boosted health from nex armors, and high tier dungeoneering armors. :)
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmLb.jpg[/img] End game bosses soon to be implemented.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmOu.jpg[/img] FULLY WORKING QBD STAGES.
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3PmUG.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/3EGgN.jpg[/img] Lava mining, whats up.
All working skills! Green = 100% Yellow = 25+%
Attack Strength Defence Ranged Prayer Magic Consitiution Crafting Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Runecrafting Dungeoneering Agility Herblore Thieving Fletching Slayer Farming Construction Hunter Summoning
Hello! If those pictures didn't pull you in, then.. I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server.
Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I'm telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I'm IRL with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I'll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers.. I hope you will be among those players.
EDIT: I've started dungeoneering and rewards. Dominion tower and rewards. I've perfected Nex. Added the four stages to QBD, Finished up a notice board, Made the most legit Donor Zone Ive ever seen :) Fixed Agility and herblore, Fixed Mining and smithing Fixed the Summoning scrolls bug. Made Jad 63 Waves, That is just the tip of the Ice Burg, Added a few items as well, Working on Drygores as we speak. Its coming along, But I'm focusing on a good fundamental game before I go crazy. SO MUCH MORE, I'll be uploading more pictures later through the day ;)

item.title: Colossus 742! 24/7! BRAND new! Looking for a new players! Live as of today! <3
item.dc:creator: @ColossusRSPS ColossusRSPS
item.description:
@ColossusRSPS wrote:

Hello!
Today I will be showing you my project that has been in development for several months now.
Before I make a long speech 75% of you won’t read, I’m just going to give you some pictures, and information at the bottom!

EDIT: COLOSSUS IS 100% RUNNING!
VPS 24 HOUR HOSTED! WEB SITE AND FORUMS UP AND RUNNING!
TAKING ALL MEMBERS OUT OF BETA PHASE!

Go to our website! <3
http://colossusrsps.com/

Download our client

Colossus.rar


FULLY WORKING BANK FUNCTIONS!


Fully functional Completionist Cape!


New Models, Every item usable!


A sorta orginal home!


A MOTHER-FU!@##@! BABY JAD!


Working boosted health from nex armors, and high tier dungeoneering armors.


End game bosses soon to be implemented.


FULLY WORKING QBD STAGES.


Lava mining, whats up.

All working skills!
Green = 100%
Yellow = 25+%

Attack
Strength
Defence
Ranged

Firemaking
Woodcutting
Runecrafting
Dungeoneering
Agility
Herblore
Thieving

Slayer
Farming
Construction
Hunter
Summoning

Hello! If those pictures didn’t pull you in, then… I might understand. XD To be honest I really suggest you come and just make a account and test out the server.

Colossus will be something different than an other server. I know everyone says that, but here is what I’m telling you, Colossus will be ran by the players; In the sense that I code my own server, and I’m IRL with all the admins. That leaves no room for error in the administration, I’ll be taking polls and listening to every player that puts time into make this server one of the best in all Private Servers… I hope you will be among those players.

EDIT:
I’ve started dungeoneering and rewards.
Dominion tower and rewards.
I’ve perfected Nex.
Added the four stages to QBD,
Finished up a notice board,
Made the most legit Donor Zone Ive ever seen
Fixed Agility and herblore,
Fixed Mining and smithing
Fixed the Summoning scrolls bug.
Made Jad 63 Waves,
That is just the tip of the Ice Burg,
Added a few items as well, Working on Drygores as we speak.
Its coming along, But I’m focusing on a good fundamental game before I go crazy.
SO MUCH MORE, I’ll be uploading more pictures later through the day
